class.name: script_engine/EvalCall
class.description: Test module for the script engine. Registers a meta eval service call.

class.name: script_engine/BooleanCall
class.description: Registers a meta update boolean service call.

class.name: script_engine/EmptyCall
class.description: Registers a meta empty service call.

class.name: script_engine/UpdateRateCall
class.description: Registers a meta update rate service call.

class.name: script_engine/SysCall
class.description: Executes commands on the shell through a system() call.

class.name: script_engine/PubEmpty
class.description: Publish an empty message on the specified topic.

class.name: script_engine/PubBoolean
class.description: Publish a boolean on the specified topic.

class.name: script_engine/PubInt8
class.description: Publish an 8-bit integer on the specified topic.

class.name: script_engine/PubInt16
class.description: Publish a 16-bit integer on the specified topic.

class.name: script_engine/PubInt32
class.description: Publish a 32-bit integer on the specified topic.

class.name: script_engine/PubInt64
class.description: Publish a 64-bit integer on the specified topic.

class.name: script_engine/PubFloat32
class.description: Publish a float on the specified topic.

class.name: script_engine/PubFloat64
class.description: Publish a double on the specified topic.

class.name: script_engine/PubString
class.description: Publish a string on the specified topic.

class.name: script_engine/PubNavGoal
class.description: Publish a navigation goal on a 2D plane on the specified topic and frame_id.

class.name: script_engine/PubDuration
class.description: Publish a duration on the specified topic.
